item.title: Bow fletcher
item.dc:creator: @notsaslipen notsaslipen
item.description:
@notsaslipen wrote:

program New;
{.include si.scar}
const
bowtype = ‘long’; //long or short
var
b1,b2,X : integer;

procedure bankbows;
begin
OpenBank;
Deposit(1,2,27);
end;

procedure makeshortbows;
begin;
X := BitmapFromString(12, 13, ‘z78DA33753135313137A519E9860’ +
‘4881127C61C0330C02F4EBC69982650CB1C4AC28A5497E0770F25’ +
‘2EA13C8491FD3250F14EDDF4832B76C88B35624800FC35D4AD’);
MouseItem(1,true);
MouseItem(2,true);
wait(2000+random(1000));
movemousesmooth(105, 408);
wait(200+random(100));
clickmouse(143,414,false);
wait(500+random(100));
findbitmap(X,b1,b2);
movemousesmooth(b1,b2);
wait(100+random(100));
clickmouse(b1,b2,true);
wait(2000+random(100));
sendkeys(‘27’);
wait(100+(100));
sendkeys(chr(13));
CheckRandoms(1,‘woodcutting’,‘n’,true,false,srtAll);
GameTab(2);
movemousesmooth(653,377)
CheckRandoms(1,‘woodcutting’,‘n’,true,false,srtAll);
wait(10000+random(1000));
CheckRandoms(1,‘woodcutting’,‘n’,true,false,srtAll);
wait(10000+random(1000));
CheckRandoms(1,‘woodcutting’,‘n’,true,false,srtAll);
wait(10000+random(1000));
CheckRandoms(1,‘woodcutting’,‘n’,true,false,srtAll);
wait(10000+random(1000));
CheckRandoms(1,‘woodcutting’,‘n’,true,false,srtAll);
wait(10000+random(1000));
GameTab(4);
bankbows;
end;

procedure makelongbows;
begin;
X := BitmapFromString(12, 13, ‘z78DA33753135313137A519E9860’ +
‘4881127C61C0330C02F4EBC69982650CB1C4AC28A5497E0770F25’ +
‘2EA13C8491FD3250F14EDDF4832B76C88B35624800FC35D4AD’);
MouseItem(1,true);
MouseItem(2,true);
wait(2000+random(1000));
movemousesmooth(380, 408);
wait(200+random(100));
clickmouse(143,414,false);
wait(500+random(100));
findbitmap(X,b1,b2);
movemousesmooth(b1,b2);
wait(100+random(100));
clickmouse(b1,b2,true);
wait(2000+random(100));
sendkeys(‘27’);
wait(100+(100));
sendkeys(chr(13));
CheckRandoms(1,‘woodcutting’,‘n’,true,false,srtAll);
GameTab(2);
movemousesmooth(653,377)
CheckRandoms(1,‘woodcutting’,‘n’,true,false,srtAll);
wait(10000+random(1000));
CheckRandoms(1,‘woodcutting’,‘n’,true,false,srtAll);
wait(10000+random(1000));
CheckRandoms(1,‘woodcutting’,‘n’,true,false,srtAll);
wait(10000+random(1000));
CheckRandoms(1,‘woodcutting’,‘n’,true,false,srtAll);
wait(10000+random(1000));
CheckRandoms(1,‘woodcutting’,‘n’,true,false,srtAll);
wait(10000+random(1000));
GameTab(4);
bankbows;
end;

procedure bowselection;
begin
if(bowtype = ‘long’)then
makelongbows;
if(bowtype = ‘short’)then
makeshortbows;
end;

procedure getlogs;
begin
OpenBank;
repeat
FixBank;
Withdraw(1,1,27);
CloseWindow;
bowselection;
until(false)
end;

procedure setup;
begin
LoadItems;
GameTab(2);
GameTab(4);
MakeCompass(‘n’);
ChatsOff;
getlogs;
end;

begin
setup;
end.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2007, 07:02:32 PM[/size][hr]this script way too detectable right?
